entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
